pages.text: > $(n)Behavior:$() Passive$(br)> $(n)Spawn:$() $(6)Crystal World().$(br)> $(n)Drops:$() 1-3 $(item)Raw Beef$(), 1-3 $(item)Cooked Beef$() if killed with fire, 0-2 $(item)Leather$(), 2-4 $(item)Apple$(), 1-2 $(item)Crystal Apple$()

pages.title: Description
pages.text: With the Crystal Worldâ€™s inversion of the overworld, many mobs came with it. One of these mobs were the Apple Cows. Unable to eat apples, they found Crystal Apples. And so, they ate the crystal apples and would transform into Crystal Apple Cows. Today, they wander the Crystal World only.
